about_the_game:
INTRODUCTION
On an ancient, forgetten island, you are called to restore the natural flow. Embark on a sacred journey, recover the last magical seeds kept by a civilization from long disappeared and make them grow into majestic flowers.




Explore a handcrafted world full of hidden and mysterious places, travel Arvumannu and rediscover a forgotten land.




Take care of the magical flowers, giving them all the necessary cures until they are ready to be planted. Each flower is essential and, once planted, will help you in your journey.




Jump and run through several locations. Every place you can see can be explored, if you know how to get there.



Your task is a small part of all there is to discover in the world of Florifer. While wandering, you will encounter mysterious travellers and discover clues about ancient events. Can you unveil the secrets of the island?



A mysterious island, secret and, they say, cursed; with perched cities on the mountains, mazy forests, dangerous swamps, glorious roots, lakes that seem to hold the moon and much more to see.




STORY
The island of Arvumannu earned itself a dark reputation over the centuries: only the craziest and most skilled sailors can get around the impetuous currents and the rocky shores and reach the safest spots for docking. Even if anybody managed to put a feet on the island, nobody ever returned to tell. Long centuries passed since the civilization of the island still held relationships with the outside world. Their destiny is hid beyond the mountains and the ocean's vastness. Legends speak of ghosts infesting the waters, the skies and the lands of the island, lighting up the nights with malevolent glimmers.
Nonetheless, the island of Arvumannu has some guests: stubborn travellers who defied the scariest rumours, looking for knowledge, treasures and glory. And a tiny, mute little thing, who just woke up below an ancient shrine. Before he realises it, he is invested with the responsibilities of his holy position and prepared to the mission: using the Pothorn, the Bearer shall explore the four corners of the island of Arvumannu, seeking for magical seeds, left by the last sages of a dead civilization centuries ago. They are the last seeds of flowers with unmatched magical powers, capable of shift the elements and restore the natural flows of the entire island, trapped in a long stagnation.
In his journey, the Bearer will have to take care of the magical seeds, carefully growing them in the Pothorn and learning all is necessary to know about each of them, to then plant them in the chosen sacred places when they are mature. The island of Arvumannu is uninhabitated, but not silent: every rock, tree and town speaks of distant era of glory and harmony with Nature. Traces of the cataclysms and fractures that brought the island to its current desolate state are not hidden to those who are willing to discover them...

short_description: Discover a vast, abandoned island as you find the last magical seeds and grow them into flowers. It is you, the Bearer, who will plant them in the sacred places and bring the land back to life.
